New episode today!

So i was watching tv, and there was commericials, so i am waiting them for them to end, then all of a sudden I hear'Hi i am pinkie pie' So i burst up to see what it is, what do you know a commercial for MLP

Ok, quiz time: favorite episode?

Mine is Hurricane Fluttershy.

*squee*
S1? I still can\'t decide. S2? Ep 3... but to be fair I haven\'t seen any in a month or so.

I liked Season 2, Episode 4 'Luna Eclipsed'.

One of my personal favorites, if only I\'m for the New Lunar Republic. Har Har.
Favorite episode definitely was Friend in Deed. Great song that I still catch myself humming once in a while and everything about it was hilarious.
That\'s a hard question, s1 26 was good...the one where rarity had to find a bunch of diamonds with spike and gets captured was also good...
i must say s1 ep 11. WINTER WRAP UP FTW!!!
Apparently there is a brony MC server. Any of you know about it?
I\'ve been on there. It\'s a bit crowded, I prefer smaller communities where one person is big enough to be noticed

I\'ve been on there. It\'s a bit crowded, I prefer smaller communities where one person is big enough to be noticed

Which are you talking about? My Little Crafters has hardly anyone on these days.

That\'s an entirely different server then.

The one I hopped on had Brony in the title and a constant 20-40 players online. I don\'t like being lost in the crowd.

That\'s an entirely different server then.

The one I hopped on had Brony in the title and a constant 20-40 players online. I don\'t like being lost in the crowd.

Oh. This one is pretty good and not at all crowded. Creations aren\'t half bad either. A few friends and I even made an underground town.
If I can get Minecraft to recognize that my copy is genuine again, I\'ll hop on some time.

If I can get Minecraft to recognize that my copy is genuine again, I\'ll hop on some time.

Alright then. Hope to see you on soon.

Anyways, if you can\'t tell from the previous conversation I have indeed 'joined the herd'.

Oh, figured out the problem.

Apparently the beta launchers won\'t cooperate with minecraft servers - redownloading the game now.

What\'s the IP for this My Little Crafters server?
